typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as double,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExcelSalesSource
ExcelSalesSource alterRow(deleteIf(isNull(Sno)),
	upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowWithSNo
AlterRowWithSNo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Sno,
		each(match(type=='string'),
			replace($$,' ','') = $$),
		each(match(type=='double'),
			replace($$,' ','') = $$),
		each(match(type=='date'),
			replace($$,' ','') = $$),
		each(match(type=='integer'),
			replace($$,' ','') = $$)
	)) ~> AzureSQL
